00043 template <class Elem> class HeapTree {
00044 
00045 private:
00046 
00048     Elem* data;
00049 
00051     int numberOfElements;
00052 
00054     int maxSize;
00055 
00056 public:
00057

00063

00131 template <class Elem> 
00132 HeapTree<Elem>::HeapTree ( int mSize ) {
00133 
00134     maxSize = mSize;
00135     data = new Elem [ maxSize ];
00136     numberOfElements = 0;
00137 
00138 } // end HeapTree
00139 
00140 
00141 template <class Elem>
00142 HeapTree<Elem>::HeapTree ( const HeapTree<Elem>& otherTree ) {
00143 
00144     int i;
00145     maxSize = otherTree.maxSize;
00146     data = new Elem [ maxSize ];
00147     numberOfElements = otherTree.numberOfElements;
00148 
00149     for ( i = 0; i < otherTree.numberOfElements; i++ ) {
00150         data[i] = otherTree.data[i];
00151     }
00152     
00153 } // end HeapTree
00154 
00155 
00156 template <class Elem>
00157 HeapTree<Elem>::~HeapTree () {
00158 
00159     if ( data ) { 
00160         delete [] data;
00161     }
00162 
00163 } // end ~HeapTree
00164 
00165 
00166 template <class Elem>
00167 bool HeapTree<Elem>::add ( const Elem& item ) {
00168 
00169     if ( numberOfElements >= maxSize ) {
00170         return false;
00171     }
00172 
00173     data[ numberOfElements ] = item;
00174     shiftUp ( numberOfElements ++ );
00175     
00176     return true;
00177     
00178 } // end add
00179 
00180 
00181 template <class Elem>
00182 Elem HeapTree<Elem>::remove () {
00183 
00184     Elem aux;
00185 
00186     if ( numberOfElements > 0 ) {
00187         aux = data[0];
00188         data[0] = data[ -- numberOfElements ];  // Replace with the last element.
00189         shiftDown ( 0 );
00190     }
00191 
00192     return aux;
00193 
00194 } // end remove
00195 
00196 
00197 template <class Elem>
00198 void HeapTree<Elem>::removeAll () {
00199     numberOfElements = 0;
00200 } // end removeAll
00201 
00202 
00203 template <class Elem>
00204 inline int HeapTree<Elem>::getNumberOfElements () {
00205     return numberOfElements;
00206 } // end getNumberOfElements
00207 
00208 
00209 template <class Elem>
00210 inline Elem& HeapTree<Elem>::getElementAt ( int i ) {
00211 
00212     if ( i >= numberOfElements ) {
00213         std::string logMessage = "      > [ERROR N4] Not enough elements in the heap. \n ";
00214         Utils::logWarningError ( logMessage );
00215         exit ( 0 );
00216     }
00217 
00218     return data[i];
00219     
00220 } // end getElementAt
00221 
00222 
00223 template <class Elem>
00224 inline Elem& HeapTree<Elem>::getFirst() {
00225 
00226     if ( numberOfElements == 0 ) {
00227         std::string logMessage = "      > [ERROR N4] No elements in the heap. \n ";
00228         Utils::logWarningError ( logMessage );
00229         exit ( 0 );
00230     }
00231 
00232     return data[0];
00233     
00234 } // end getFirst
00235 
00236 
00237 template <class Elem>
00238 void HeapTree<Elem>::shiftUp ( int currentNode ) {
00239 
00240     int parent = parentOf ( currentNode );
00241     Elem item = data[ currentNode ];
00242 
00243     while ( currentNode > 0 ) {
00244         if ( data[ parent ] < item ) {
00245             data[ currentNode ] = data[ parent ];
00246             currentNode = parent;
00247             parent = parentOf ( currentNode );
00248         }
00249         else {
00250             break;
00251         }
00252     }
00253 
00254     data[ currentNode ] = item;
00255 
00256 } // end shiftUp
00257 
00258 
00259 template <class Elem>
00260 void HeapTree<Elem>::shiftDown ( int currentNode ) {
00261 
00262     int child = leftChildOf ( currentNode );
00263     Elem item = data[ currentNode ];
00264 
00265     while ( child < numberOfElements ) {
00266 
00267         if ( child < ( numberOfElements - 1 ) )
00268             if ( data[ child ] < data[ child + 1 ] )
00269                 child ++;
00270 
00271         if ( item < data[ child ] ) {
00272             data[ currentNode ] = data[ child ];
00273             currentNode         = child;
00274             child                       = leftChildOf ( currentNode );
00275         }
00276         else {
00277             break;
00278         }
00279     }
00280 
00281     data[ currentNode ] = item;
00282 
00283 } // end shiftDown
00284 
00285 
00286 template <class Elem>
00287 inline int HeapTree<Elem>::parentOf ( int currentNode ) {
00288     return ( currentNode - 1 ) / 2;
00289 } // end parentOf
00290 
00291 
00292 template <class Elem>
00293 inline int HeapTree<Elem>::leftChildOf ( int currentNode ) {
00294     return ( currentNode * 2 ) + 1;
00295 } // end leftChildOf
00296 
00297 
00298 template <class Elem>
00299 void HeapTree<Elem>::print () {
00300     
00301     for ( int i = 0; i < numberOfElements; i++ ) {
00302         std::cout << data[i] << "  " ;
00303     }
00304     std::cout << std::endl;
00305 
00306 } // end print
